name: Education-related debt of doctorate recipients, by sex, citizenship status, ethnicity, and race: 2019

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

notes: Mean calculations are based on all valid responses to debt item. See technical notes for details on calculations of means.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Earned Doctorates.
